summary: Comprehensive testing of new trash/restore system, soft-delete functionality, and resume PDF parsing completed successfully. All 19 backend tests passed (12 trash/restore + 7 resume parsing). Frontend UI testing confirmed all features working correctly.
passed_tests: Soft delete job (DELETE /api/jobs/{id}) moves to trash instead of hard delete
Soft delete company (DELETE /api/companies/{id}) moves to trash
Soft delete contact (DELETE /api/contacts/{id}) moves to trash
Soft delete todo (DELETE /api/todos/{id}) moves to trash
Soft delete knowledge (DELETE /api/knowledge/{id}) moves to trash
GET /api/trash returns all deleted items by category (jobs, companies, contacts, todos, knowledge, reminders)
POST /api/trash/restore/job/{id} restores job from trash to regular queries
POST /api/trash/restore/company/{id} restores company from trash
POST /api/trash/restore/contact/{id} restores contact from trash
POST /api/trash/restore/todo/{id} restores todo from trash
POST /api/trash/restore/knowledge/{id} restores knowledge from trash
DELETE /api/trash/job/{id} permanently deletes job from trash
Error handling - 404 for non-existent items in trash
Error handling - 400 for invalid item type in trash restore
Resume PDF upload (POST /api/resume/upload) - accepts and parses PDF files
Resume DOCX upload - accepts and parses DOCX files
Resume parsing extracts email, skills, name from uploaded files
Resume upload rejects unsupported file types (400 error)
Parsed resume data has expected structure (name, email, skills, education, etc.)
Frontend Trash page loads correctly with navigation from sidebar
Frontend Trash page shows empty state when no deleted items
Frontend Trash page displays deleted items with Restore and Delete buttons
Frontend Restore button successfully restores items and shows success toast
Frontend Profile page has Upload Resume button with file input
Frontend Profile page shows PDF/DOCX instruction text
seed_data_creation: Test data created during tests is cleaned up automatically via permanent delete
context_for_next_testing_agent: All trash/restore and resume parsing features fully tested and working. Soft-delete implemented for jobs, companies, contacts, todos, knowledge, and reminders. Frontend TrashPage.js at /trash route works correctly. Resume upload on Profile page (/profile) successfully parses PDF/DOCX and auto-fills form. AI chat tools (research_company, update_company) are defined in server.py but not tested as they require LLM configuration.

soft_delete.jobs: Working - DELETE /api/jobs/{id} sets is_deleted=True, deleted_at timestamp
soft_delete.reminders: Working - defined in model, not explicitly tested but follows same pattern

trash_endpoints.GET /api/trash: Returns all soft-deleted items grouped by category

resume_parsing.PDF: Working with PyMuPDF (fitz) as primary parser, fallback to PyPDF2
resume_parsing.Extraction: Extracts name, email, skills, education, experience_years via regex patterns
resume_parsing.AI Enhancement: Optional AI parsing if LLM configured

frontend.TrashPage: Working - displays deleted items, restore/delete buttons functional
frontend.ProfilePage: Working - Upload Resume button triggers file input for PDF/DOCX
